ul.li: XSLT execution using fn:transform call from SaxonJS.XPath.evaluate

possible inputs:
XML
JSON (parsed with fn:parse-json)
HTML (parsed with browser's DOMParser as text/html)
plain text (passed as xs:string context item to XSLT)
no input (processing starts with named template xsl:initial-template)
supports secondary result documents created with xsl:result-document
now with load buttons to load input XML or JSON or HTML or plain text and/or XSLT from local file system
also save link/button to save result document to the file system
save XML or JSON or HTML or plain text input and XSLT code in URL query string
print result frame document (with browser print dialogue, e.g. to PDF document)
